name: odcld
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cn0), wcel(c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cn0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cn0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cn0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cn0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cn0))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cod, c3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wcel(cfv(c0, c1), cn0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wceq(c0, cfv(cod, c3))

comment: Deduction associated with ~ odcl . (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
